ygData.msgSnippet: ... I also go by the prices posted in the Smith s union.  Here is the URL http://home.earthlink.net/~sblack9/Blacksmiths.htm 1pp per AC is fine if you re a
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Wed, 03 Nov 1999 03:25:17 -0800
> From: Runepuck <runepuck@...>
>Subject: New to the trade...
>
>Hello all. I'm new to the trade of smithing and would like some info on
>what to sell the pieces for. I've seen some radically different prices and
>would like a general concensus of going rates.
>
>Also, I've heard that you can now forge weapons. What skill is needed for
>them and what supplies?
>
>Thank you for your time,
>Cyrodane of Tarew Marr
>
>

I also go by the prices posted in the Smith's union. Here is the URL
http://home.earthlink.net/~sblack9/Blacksmiths.htm

1pp per AC is fine if you're a master or in an area with high competition,
but you'll never cover your expenses at that price when you're still
learning. I suggest you visit the Queynos/Halas areas, on my server at least
there are the fewest number of armorers and of course no easy access to
bronze armor (Faydark is NOTORIOUS for having the poorest prices for banded
of any zone because of easy access to bronze!).

Araman, 19th level Paladin
Warwinds of Norrath, E'ci
Skill 143 Blacksmith
